body.p:
Louisville Kentucky
Sept 6th 1865
To his Excelency Thos, E, Bramlett
Governer of Kentucky
Enclosed find a petition in favor of Ben Duke a free man of Colour, which I am proud to say presents stronger claims than is usual. Ben is an exception among his negros Race --

Governor If you feel it to be your duty to remit bens Bond I hope you will do so as soon as possible the old man is in the last stages of Consumption & has a large helpless family & I dont want him to die with this on his mind
Enclose me the Remitten & I will Enclose back the fee to the Sect -- &c S, W, B,

Notary Public
W De B. Morrill
apptd for State at large 7 Sept/ 65
